# CMake build : third party

#configure directories
set (THIRD_PARTY_MODULE_PATH "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/third_party")

add_subdirectory (catch)

#set variables
set (THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_PATH  ${CATCH_INCLUDE_PATH})
set (THIRD_PARTY_CUSTOM_MODULES_PATH  ${CATCH_CUSTOM_MODULES_PATH})

#export vars
set (THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_PATH  ${THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_PATH} PARENT_SCOPE)
set (THIRD_PARTY_CUSTOM_MODULES_PATH  ${THIRD_PARTY_CUSTOM_MODULES_PATH} PARENT_SCOPE)
